description: Steel Dragon Tools MD25 1350W Magnetic Drill Press with 1in. Boring Diameter 7in. Boring Depth & 3372 lb Magnetic ForceThe Steel Dragon Tools MD25 Magnetic Drill Press has 3,372 lbs. of magnetic force to ensure the press will not move during operation. This press will attach directly to the metal surface to drill precision holes quickly and safely. The MD25 has a 1,350-watt motor and offers a maximum boring depth of 7 in. and maximum boring diameter of 1 in. The MD25 has an MT3 spindle taper and comes with an MT3 to MT2 spindle adapter. A secured magnetic drill press provides more leverage than a hand drill, allowing the operator to cut even, consistent holes. The magnet also allows the drill to operate upside down. A full line of 1-inch and 2-inch HSS annular cutters by Steel Dragon Tools are available. Specifications: Suitable for drilling on any metal surface. Rack and pinion gear system for exact drilling depth. One (1) year warranty against manufacturer defect. Specifications: Motor: High-Speed, Induction, 1,350 W, 110 V, 60 Hz Max Magnetic Force: 3,372 lbs. (15,000 N). Thinner metal will result in less force. Maximum Boring Diameter: 1 in. (25 mm) Maximum Boring Depth: 7 in. (180 mm) Spindle Speed: 480 RPM Spindle Taper: MT3 Includes MT3 to MT2 spindle adapter.
